about_the_game:
Act 3: Sloth

HITMAN 3: Seven Deadly Sins takes you deep into the mind of Agent 47. Get exclusive sin-themed suits and take on brand-new challenges to unlock unique rewards. Can you resist all seven sins?

This DLC pack includes access to the following content:

- "The Lotophage" Suit
- "The Slapdash" SMG
- "The Goldbrick" Sedative Proximity Mine
- "The Sloth Depletion" Escalation

This DLC pack includes Act 3: Sloth. All seven Acts can be purchased together in the Seven Deadly Sins Collection.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
